name: Horizon Pharmaceuticals
body:
### About
Horizon Pharmaceuticals Limited is a privately owned company located in the United Kingdom.  The company is dedicated to developing and commercializing products to address the unmet clinical needs of patients. Horizon utilises engineered technologies for effective therapeutic delivery of drugs.

### Contact
info@horizonpharma.co.uk

### Important Note
Horizon specialises in R&D and **does not** supply any products through online shops or websites. It has come to our notice that fake online shops are using Horizonâ€™s company number fraudulently.
